import React from 'react'; const CompareForecastItem=({element})=> { const { image, weather, date, tempMax, tempMin, pressure, wind, clouds, humidity, sunrise, sunset } = element; return (

{date}

{weather}

max:{tempMax}° min:{tempMin}°

{clouds}% {humidity}%

{sunrise} {sunset}

{pressure} hPa

{wind}km/h

) }; const weatherIcons = { 1:'/images/clouds.png', 2:'/images/sunrise.png', 3:'/images/sunset.png', 4:'/images/humidity.png', 5:'/images/temp.webp', 6:'/images/pressure.png', 7:'/images/wind.png', }; export default CompareForecastItem;
